title: The Future of Embedded Finance 2022 - Finextra
content: The Future of Embedded Finance 2022  Finextra
description:
Which European Stakeholders will Win or Lose?
 
Momentum towards embedded finance has been building slowly but surely over the past decade, as demand for seamless e-commerce solutions push both financial and non-financial players to serve their digitally discerning customers more effectively.
 
The arrival of Covid-19 and the significant shift in consumer behaviour served only to accelerate th...
